Verses: 2 en Needhi Dhevanudaiya Needhiyaippaarkkilum Periyadhendru Neer Sonnadhu Nyaayam Endru Ennugireero?
3 naan Paaviyaayiraadhadhinaal Enakkup Prayojanamenna? Palan Enna? Endru Sonneer.
4 umakkum Ummode Irukkira Ummudaiya Snegidharukkum Naan Pradhiyuththaram Sollugiren.
5 neer Vaanaththai Annaandhu Paarththu, Ummaippaarkkilum Uyaramaayirukkira Aagaayamandalangalaik Kannokkum.
6 neer Paavancheydhaal Adhinaale Avarukku Enna Nashtam? Ummudaiya Meerudhalgal Migudhiyaanaalum, Adhinaale Avarukku Enna Sedham?
7 neer Needhimaanaayirundhaal, Adhinaale Avarukku Enna Kidaikkum? Alladhu Avar Ummudaiya Kaiyil Enna Laabaththaip Peruvaar?
8 ummudaiya Paavaththinaal Ummaippondra Manushanukku Nashtamum, Ummudaiya Needhiyinaal Manupuththiranukku Laabamum Undaagum.
9 anegaraal Balavandhamaai Odukkappattavargal Muraiyittu, Vallavargaludaiya Buyaththinimiththam Alarugiraargal.
10 boomiyin Mirugangalaippaarkkilum Engalai Buththimaangalum, Aagaasaththup Paravaigalaippaarkkilum Engalai Gnaanavaangalumaakki,
11 ennai Undaakkinavarum, Iravilum Keedhampaada Arulseygiravarumaagiya En Sirushtikarththaavaagiya Dhevan Enge Endru Ketpavan Oruvanumillai.
12 ange Avargal Pollaadhavargalin Perumaiyinimiththam Kooppidugiraargal; Avaro Maruuththaravu Kodukkiradhillai.
13 dhevan Veenvaarththaikku Sevikodaar, Sarvavallavar Adhai Gavaniyaar.
14 avarudaiya Dharisanam Umakkuk Kidaikkiradhillai Endru Neer Sollugireere; Aanaalum Nyaayaththeerppu Avaridaththil Irukkiradhu; Aagaiyaal Avarukkuk Kaaththukkondirum.
15 ippodhu Avarudaiya Kobamaanadhu Nyaayaththai Mutrilum Visaariyaadhu; Avar Innum Ondraiyum Kuraiyatravidhamaaith Theerkkavillai.
16 aagaiyaal Yobu Veenaaith Thammudaiya Vaayaith Thirandhu, Arivillaamal Vaarththaigalai Migudhiyaai Vasanikkiraar Endraan.
